entries.entry: we're slowly learning how to work in groups. it's been fun.
started javascript. really happy to get going on that. stoked to get real confused. and now we're edited?
started objects today. remembered I need to make sure I pay really close attention to small details and not get too tripped up when I don't get it the first time

Just had the BIGGEST breakthough in my understanding of how fetching objects works. I had made fetching from two APIs and appending them to the DOM work, but I didn't understand how. Brenda sat down with me and talked me through what I did, which led to me realizing how easily I could manipulate an object that I've grabbed by even ADDING to it from ANOTHER API! WHAT?!?! So cool.

i kind of love factory functions, the utilitarian nature of them is pretty awesome. just make this thing for me, please. we also had a small panel of NSS grads come in today to talk about their experiences with networking during and after their time here. it was enlightening and a great chance to chat with some people that were in our position not that long ago.

bryan and i just spent about an hour and a half trying to get this journal to update when you submit the info. brenda fixed it in about 3 minutes. i'm frustrated but at the important thing is... IT WORKS!
